projections.query: PREFIX nxv: <https://bluebrain.github.io/nexus/vocabulary/> PREFIX xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> CONSTRUCT { {resource_id} ?p ?o . } WHERE { {resource_id} ?p ?o . FILTER(!strstarts(str(?p),str(nxv:)) && ?o != "validate"^^xsd:string && ?o != "validate@validate.com"^^xsd:string && ?o != <http://schema.org/Thing>) }
